name: Portal-TI
tagline: Portal Program Studi Teknik Informatika UNRIYO
body:
Portal Teknik Informatika ==== this project is one of my college's assignments (Mainly using Ext JS 4) future features:
-home (guest/user)
-lecture schedule
-add/update/delete lecture schedule
-news
-add/update/delete news
-e-learning(upload assignment resluts, info from lecturer, download/upload lecture materials)
-TI info
-add/update/delete TI info
-chatting (probably)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
